TopicTitle: Gravitsapa - Does this work in version 0.19?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I downloaded the Gravitsapa Antigravity mod, but I dont see it anywhere. Does this work in the version 0.19? if so, where can i find it? I checked through all the items over and over.

Appreciate any help!!

Thanks!
That mod is probably severely out of date. If you press Alt+F12 you can open the debug panel and switch gravity off though, that will work.
